short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun, offline Pocket Tanks-inspired game for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take a trip down memory lane with this Pocket Tanks-inspired game, now conveniently available as a Chrome extension!

Features:

Simple and intuitive controls: Adjust angle and power with your keyboard and fire away!.
Destructible terrains that keep the game challenging and fresh.
Lightweight and fast—perfect for short breaks during your day.

Why You’ll Love It:

No Separate Tabs: The game runs directly in your browser, right within the extension popup. No need to open a separate tab or leave your current work.
Classic Gameplay: Experience the thrill of aiming, shooting, and destroying, with smart AI opponents and dynamic terrain.
